statements: SELECT * FROM tour_schedule
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM tour_schedule WHERE event_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT venue_name, event_name FROM tour_schedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM tour_schedule WHERE venue_name LIKE 'Madison Square Garden%'
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM tour_schedule ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT * FROM tour_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM tour_schedule WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY venue_name DESC
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM tour_schedule WHERE event_name LIKE '%Concert%' ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM tour_schedule WHERE venue_name = 'Madison Square Garden' OR venue_name = 'Staples Center'
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM tour_schedule WHERE event_date <= '2022-12-31' AND venue_name NOT LIKE '%Theater%' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM TourSchedule;
SELECT artist_name, tour_date FROM TourSchedule WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT venue_name, location FROM VenueInformation WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM VenueInformation ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT artist_name, tour_date, venue_name, location FROM TourSchedule JOIN VenueInformation ON TourSchedule.venue_id = VenueInformation.venue_id;
SELECT * FROM TourSchedule;
SELECT artist_name, venue_id FROM TourSchedule WHERE tour_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT venue_name, location FROM VenueInformation ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, tour_date FROM TourSchedule WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM VenueInformation WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM venues;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venues;
SELECT venue_id, venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT venue_id, location FROM venues ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM venues WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY venue_name;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY artist_name;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT artist_name, genre, venue_name, date, start_time, end_time FROM artists JOIN tour_schedules ON artists.artist_id = tour_schedules.artist_id JOIN venues ON venues.venue_id = tour_schedules.venue_id WHERE date = '2022-09-15' ORDER BY venue_name ASC, start_time;

SELECT artist_name, venue_name, date FROM artists JOIN tour_schedules ON artists.artist_id = tour_schedules.artist_id JOIN venues ON venues.venue_id = tour_schedules.venue_id WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran' AND date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY date;
SELECT * FROM tour;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM tour;
SELECT tour_name, tour_description FROM tour WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, venue_location, capacity FROM venue ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM event JOIN venue ON event.venue_id = venue.venue_id;
SELECT * FROM tour WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tour_name DESC;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM tour WHERE tour_description LIKE '%fun%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM event INNER JOIN venue ON event.venue_id = venue.venue_id WHERE event_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT artist_name, genre, booking_agent FROM artist WHERE genre = 'Pop' OR genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY artist_name ASC, genre DESC;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location, capacity, contact_person FROM venue WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM tour_schedule;
SELECT tour_id, tour_name FROM tour_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, venue_city FROM venues ORDER BY venue_city ASC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, seat_number FROM tickets WHERE seat_number BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM tour_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date, venue_name FROM tour_schedule JOIN venues ON tour_schedule.venue_id = venues.venue_id WHERE venue_city = 'New York';
SELECT artist_name, genre, performance_date FROM artists JOIN performances ON artists.artist_id = performances.artist_id WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT venue_name, venue_city, venue_capacity FROM venues WHERE venue_capacity > 500 ORDER BY venue_capacity DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, seat_number FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price < 100 ORDER BY seat_number ASC;
